footer_main_text:
Richy Online Casino - Crypto and Fiat iGaming platform
Online casinos have revolutionized the iGaming industry in the world over the past few years. There are more and more new providers and games that win the hearts of players with their fascination and the size of the winnings.
Richy online casino combines several trends of recent years - a modern and user-friendly interface, financial mini-games and dice, cryptolotteries and tournaments, fast replenishment of the balance using a credit card and various cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Doge Coin, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash , Stellar, Cardano, Solana, USDT, Tron, etc. You can make instant withdrawals of your winnings to your Visa / Master Card / Union Pay credit cards, as well as to a cryptocurrency wallet.
Key Features
Casino Richy is an official licensed provider of gambling services. Richy provides an opportunity to use certified gaming software from the world's best developers. For all players, the gaming session takes place on fair and transparent conditions, which means that absolutely every player can receive a win, even if he makes the minimum bets.

Among the main features of the casino it is worth noting:
Guaranteed payouts. This is confirmed by the feedback of the participants, as well as the reputation of the gaming and payment providers.
Availability of generous bonuses.
The presence of a personal manager who is always ready to answer any user questions.
Quality design, usability convenience.
Own games and lotteries.
Distribution of free cryptocurrency.
Tournaments by Richy and game providers.

The advantage of using cryptocurrency
One of the advantages of the casino is that you can make a deposit here using cryptocurrency. Thus, the anonymity of using the gambling platform is preserved. It is no secret that many users would be happy to play in a casino, but do not want information about this to become available to others. Cryptocurrencies allow you to do this.
Another advantage of using cryptocurrency as a means of payment is maximum security. The absence of intermediaries when receiving and sending payments means that the funds are guaranteed to be delivered to the desired wallet.
Get richer with Richy - the received winnings can even be left to lie until better times. In a few years, the value of cryptocurrencies will increase and the player will receive even more money.

Live Casino and Virtual Sports
One of the features of the platform is the presence of a live casino and virtual sports. This game takes place with real croupiers in real time. The actions of all participants and the dealer can be observed online. To select a game, just click on Live Casino or Virtual Sports in the main menu.
Live casino is a popular gambling entertainment. Initially, it was available only to top Internet establishments, but now such games are becoming more widespread. The player can not only follow the distribution of cards and the acceptance of bets, but also directly communicate with the dealer. Thus, the feeling of visiting a real land-based casino is achieved. Professionals work as croupiers, you can see for yourself if you look at the nature and style of the game.

Free cryptocurrencies
Do you want to get free crypto guaranteed every hour?
At Richy.Casino you will be able to do this. A completely free game that can be played once every hour. After pressing the button, a combination of numbers appears and Richy gives you from 200 Satoshi to 0.01 BTC.
But the possibilities don't end there.
The received winnings can be immediately used for other games in the casino, or you can purchase lottery tickets. The ticket price is only 1 Satoshi, but you can win large sums. Summing up is carried out every week. At the end, there is a pool of winners of ten people who get the prize.
Wheel of Fortune or the wheel of fortune is another opportunity to earn money. Spin the wheel once a day for a chance to win 1 BTC.
Also, do not forget about the welcome bonus - after making the first deposit, each newcomer receives a free bonus up to 300% to the replenishment amount.

Richy Games

Richy offers its clients to play Richy Games - Craft, Mini Poker, Rouletter, Plinko, Stairs, Limbo, Keno, Dice, Diamonds, Coin Flip, Black Jack, HiLo, Mines, Towers, Wheel.

And Richy's exclusive game is Money Chess. Chess for money that you can play with other chess lovers.

Richy Games are Provably Fair games. All games are based on a random number generator. Each player can check the reality of the bet made.

Richy Games Tournament
A Richy Games tournament is held weekly. Anyone can participate, all you need to do is:
Register on the site, deposit funds into the account.
Play Rich Games.
Wait for the end of the week when the results will be summed up.
Get your cash prize.
The user who has made the highest turnover of funds wins.
The Richie Games Tournament can be won not only by those with big budgets. The gaming forums present the strategy of playing to zero. It is enough for the player to periodically win and lose, going to zero. Although you wonâ€™t be able to withdraw money in this way, you can still win bets and claim the winnings at the end of the week. Not all players agree with such a strategy, but you can always try and, if necessary, refine the tactics for yourself.

Slots
Virtual slots are suitable for those who are focused on the easiest and most enjoyable pastime.
The online slot is a random number generator, for which pictures are selected that correspond to the theme of the game - these can be ancient worlds, adventures, fruit cocktails and much more. After spinning the reels, a winning combination of images appears on the screen, which means that the player can collect his prize.
The use of slots at Richie Casino is:
Safety. All slots presented on the site undergo regular checks for the quality and reliability of the game. All of them guarantee fairness and transparency of the game.
Convenience. The player can choose any slot to his taste. There is no need to wait until this or that device is free.
The beauty. Slot machines are distinguished by high-quality attractive graphics. The presence of original musical accompaniment allows you to immerse yourself in the world of gambling even more.
Slots are a convenient and interesting option for online games for money, and their huge range will definitely not let the user get bored.
Richy Casino features slots from popular providers such as Amatic, BGaming, EvoPlay, Ezugi, TVBet, Red Tiger, KA Gaming, Mascot, Spribe, TrueLab, Pragmatic Play, Netent and others.

Providers and games
Richy Casino has over 150 providers and over 12,000 games.
Virtual Reality Games, Board Games, Dice, Arcades, Live Casino, Card Games, Roulettes, Lotteries, Crash Games, Keno and others.


Richy Casino works only with verified licensed providers such as Netent, Booming, Playngo, Relax Gaming, Red Tiger, Playson, Ezugi, KA Gaming, Mascot, Spribe, Evolution Gaming and others.

Registration
Easy registration of a new account is one of the calling cards of Richy Casino.
To get access to all offers from the casino, you will need to register. It is very easy to do - the procedure will take only a couple of minutes.
Authorization methods:
Email.
Telephone.
Social networks.
After successful registration at the casino, you can proceed to replenish the deposit and start playing.

Deposit and withdrawal of funds
Richy Casino provides its players with the opportunity to make a deposit using cryptocurrencies and a bank card.
In some countries, it is possible to replenish the wallet with various payment methods.
